workflow.name: Automate email campaign analysis & smart follow-ups with Bright Data & OpenAI
workflow.description:
*This workflow contains community nodes that are only compatible with the self-hosted version of n8n.*

This workflow automatically tracks email campaign performance metrics and triggers smart follow-up actions based on engagement data. It saves you time by eliminating the need to manually monitor campaign reports and provides intelligent re-engagement strategies for improving email marketing ROI.

## Overview

This workflow automatically scrapes email service provider (ESP) reports to extract campaign performance metrics like open rates, click-through rates, and bounce rates. It uses AI to analyze the data and automatically sends targeted follow-up emails to re-engage subscribers who opened but didn't click, maximizing campaign effectiveness.

## Tools Used

- **n8n**: The automation platform that orchestrates the workflow
- **Bright Data**: For scraping ESP campaign reports without being blocked
- **OpenAI**: AI agent for intelligent campaign data analysis and decision making
- **Gmail**: For sending automated follow-up engagement emails

## How to Install

1. **Import the Workflow**: Download the .json file and import it into your n8n instance
2. **Configure Bright Data**: Add your Bright Data credentials to the MCP Client node
3. **Set Up OpenAI**: Configure your OpenAI API credentials
4. **Configure Gmail**: Connect your Gmail account for sending follow-up emails
5. **Customize**: Set ESP report URLs and define engagement thresholds for triggering follow-ups

## Use Cases

- **Email Marketing**: Automatically optimize campaign performance with smart follow-ups
- **Marketing Automation**: Trigger re-engagement campaigns based on behavior data
- **Performance Tracking**: Monitor email metrics without manual ESP login
- **Customer Retention**: Re-engage subscribers who showed interest but didn't convert

## Connect with Me

- **Website**: https://www.nofluff.online
- **YouTube**: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
- **LinkedIn**: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
- **Get Bright Data**: https://get.brightdata.com/1tndi4600b25 (Using this link supports my free workflows with a small commission)

#n8n #automation #emailmarketing #campaigntracking #brightdata #webscraping #emailautomation #n8nworkflow #workflow #nocode #emailcampaigns #marketingautomation #emailperformance #campaignanalysis #emailmetrics #reengagement #marketingdata #emailoptimization #campaignmonitoring #emailanalytics #digitalmarketing #performancetracking #emailstrategy #conversionoptimization #marketinganalytics #emailroi #campaigninsights #emailengagement #marketingefficiency #automatedemail

parameters.subject: Did you miss this? Here‚Äôs something special for you!

parameters.content:
## üéØ **üîπ SECTION 1: Schedule & Prepare Inputs**

### ‚úÖ **Nodes in this Section**

| Node | Name                             |
| ---- | -------------------------------- |
| ‚è∞    | **Daily Campaign Check Trigger** |
| ‚úèÔ∏è   | **Set Campaign Input Fields**    |

---

### üí° **What Happens Here**

* **‚è∞ Daily Campaign Check Trigger:**
  This node automatically **starts the workflow on a schedule** ‚Äî for example, every morning at 9‚ÄØAM.
  It makes sure you **don‚Äôt have to run it manually** every time. The goal is to check your email campaign performance **regularly and consistently**.

* **‚úèÔ∏è Set Campaign Input Fields:**
  This node **defines any input values** that your Agent needs.
  For example:

  * Campaign ID
  * ESP URL
  * Date range
  * Any dynamic variables

  It acts like **filling in a form** that the rest of the workflow will use.
  You can **edit it easily** without changing the whole workflow.

---

### üéØ **Why It‚Äôs Important**

‚úÖ Automates the whole thing on autopilot.
‚úÖ Ensures the Agent always has the **right data**.
‚úÖ Makes the workflow easy to maintain for non-tech users ‚Äî just change a value in **Edit Fields**, done!

---

---

## ü§ñ **üîπ SECTION 2: Scrape & Analyze with AI Agent**

### ‚úÖ **Nodes in this Section**

| Node | Name                                             |
| ---- | ------------------------------------------------ |
| ü§ñ   | **Agent: Scrape & Analyze Campaign Performance** |
| üß†   | **LLM: Summarize & Format**                      |
| üåê   | **Bright Data MCP: Scrape Report**               |
| üóÇÔ∏è  | **Parse Scrape Output**                          |

---

### üí° **What Happens Here**

* **ü§ñ Agent: Scrape & Analyze Campaign Performance**
  This is your **AI Agent** ‚Äî it does the smart part:

  * Talks to the **Bright Data MCP Tool** to scrape the ESP report page.
  * Uses an **LLM** (OpenAI Chat Model) to process the scraped data.
  * Passes the result to an **Output Parser** to turn messy text into clean, structured data.

* **üåê Bright Data MCP: Scrape Report**
  Bright Data logs in, navigates to your campaign report page, and **scrapes live open/click numbers**.

* **üß† LLM: Summarize & Format**
  The Chat Model turns raw scraped info into easy-to-read Markdown or JSON.
  This is like having a mini data analyst!

* **üóÇÔ∏è Parse Scrape Output**
  This node extracts the final numbers (open rate, CTR, bounces) so the logic can understand them.

---

### üéØ **Why It‚Äôs Important**

‚úÖ You don‚Äôt have to log in manually to get reports.
‚úÖ The AI cleans up messy scraped data.
‚úÖ Makes follow-up decisions possible without human effort.
‚úÖ Works for **any ESP** ‚Äî if the layout changes, just adjust the scraper.

---

---

## üìà **üîπ SECTION 3: Decide & Act Automatically**

### ‚úÖ **Nodes in this Section**

| Node | Name                                |
| ---- | ----------------------------------- |
| üîé   | **IF: Open ‚â•30% & CTR <10%?**       |
| üìß   | **Send Follow-Up Engagement Email** |
| üö´   | **Skip ‚Äî No Action Needed**         |

---

### üí° **What Happens Here**

* **üîé IF: Open ‚â•30% & CTR <10%?**
  This node checks:

  * Is the open rate good? (‚â•30%)
  * But is the click-through rate low? (<10%)
    If **true**, it triggers follow-up to re-engage the audience.

* **üìß Send Follow-Up Engagement Email**
  If the condition is true, this node sends a **personalized follow-up email** automatically.
  For example: ‚ÄúHey, you opened but didn‚Äôt click ‚Äî here‚Äôs your special offer!‚Äù

* **üö´ Skip ‚Äî No Action Needed**
  If the condition is **false** (e.g. CTR is healthy), do nothing. The workflow ends safely.

---

## I‚Äôll receive a tiny commission if you join Bright Data through this link‚Äîthanks for fueling more free content!

### https://get.brightdata.com/1tndi4600b25

=======================================
            WORKFLOW ASSISTANCE
=======================================
For any questions or support, please contact:
    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:
   - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
   - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
=======================================

## üìà **üîπ SECTION 3: Decide & Act Automatically**

| Node | Name                                |
| ---- | ----------------------------------- |
| üîé   | **IF: Open ‚â•30% & CTR <10%?**       |
| üìß   | **Send Follow-Up Engagement Email** |
| üö´   | **Skip ‚Äî No Action Needed**         |

---

### üí° **What Happens Here**

* **üìß Send Follow-Up Engagement Email**

---

### üéØ **Why It‚Äôs Important**

‚úÖ Takes action **only when needed**, saving time.
‚úÖ Boosts click rates without extra manual work.
‚úÖ Protects your audience from spam by not sending unnecessary follow-ups.

---

## üåü **‚ú® Why This Whole Flow is Powerful**

* Runs daily ‚Äî **no manual checks**.
* Scrapes live data ‚Äî **no API? No problem!**
* Uses AI to process messy data ‚Äî **no coding required!**
* Makes smart decisions ‚Äî **no human micromanagement**.
* Sends the right email to the right audience at the right time ‚Äî **better engagement, better ROI!**

---

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
